summary: The module implements checkpoint I/O plugins for Lightning PyTorch, offering a generic wrapper that forwards save, load, and delete operations to an underlying implementation and an asynchronous variant that executes these operations in a background thread via a thread pool executor.
business_intent: To improve training robustness and performance by providing flexible, pluggable checkpoint handling with optional asynchronous execution, reducing I/O bottlenecks during model training and enabling seamless integration with custom storage backends.
